item.title: Ice blitz
item.dc:creator: @iwolfi iwolfi
item.description:
@iwolfi wrote:

i cant find it i looked through client.java and magichandler.java[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 20, 2008, 01:08:37 pm[/size][hr]found it its in a cfg file
// =========

// ========= gfx
spell = 12939 1978 385 0 50 562 2 560 2 554 1 556 1 -1 13 140 43 50 Smoke_Rush
spell = 12987 1978 379 0 52 562 2 560 2 556 1 566 1 -1 14 140 43 0 Shadow_Rush
spell = 12901 1978 373 0 56 562 2 560 2 565 1 -1 0 -1 15 140 0 0 Blood_Rush
spell = 12861 1978 361 0 58 562 2 560 2 555 2 -1 0 -1 16 140 0 0 Ice_Rush
spell = 12951 1978 387 0 74 560 2 565 2 554 2 556 2 -1 26 250 43 50 Smoke_Blitz
spell = 12999 1978 381 0 76 560 2 565 2 556 2 566 2 -1 24 250 43 0 Shadow_Blitz
spell = 12911 1978 375 0 80 560 2 565 4 -1 0 -1 0 -1 25 250 0 0 Blood_Blitz
spell = 12871 1978 367 0 82 560 2 565 2 555 3 -1 0 -1 26 250 0 0 Ice_Blitz

item.title: Ice blitz
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Post your blitz code here. And if it doesn’t send the gfx the player, that’s because theres not one that is telling it to go on your absX and absY…just post your code.

item.title: Ice blitz
item.dc:creator: @iwolfi iwolfi
item.description:
@iwolfi wrote:

how would i do that and ive already got gfx when it hits the player i want the gfx like this
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0ztmPCPLT7c&feature=related

Read full topic

item.title: Ice blitz
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Paste your ice blitz code here.

You may have something like

stillgfx(366, EnemyY, EnemyX);

So right below that add

stillgfx(366, absY, absX);

Try that. Not so positive about it with Delta. But it might be the same.

Read full topic

item.description:
